data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anjos-Silva, Evandson José Dos, Rebêlo, José Manuel Macário (2006): A new species of Exaerete Hoffmannsegg (Hymenoptera: Apidae: Euglossini) from Brazil. Zootaxa 1105: 27-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171435
